monitor.title: Monitor
monitor.description: My main display where all the magic happens. A high-resolution monitor perfect for coding, designing, and creative work.

keyboard.title: Keyboard
keyboard.description: A mechanical keyboard with custom switches. The tactile feedback and satisfying click makes coding a pleasure.

mouse.title: Mouse
mouse.description: Precision gaming mouse with high DPI sensor. Perfect for both work and play, offering smooth tracking and customizable buttons.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: My mobile companion for staying connected. Always within reach for quick messages, calls, and inspiration on the go.

notebook.title: Notebook
notebook.description: My trusty notebook for sketching ideas, taking notes, and brainstorming. Sometimes the best ideas start with pen and paper.

poster-1.title: Poster 1
poster-1.description: Minimalist design poster that inspires creativity. A reminder to keep pushing boundaries and think outside the box.

poster-2.title: Poster 2
poster-2.description: Geometric patterns and bold colors. This poster represents structure and chaos working together in harmony.

poster-3.title: Poster 3
poster-3.description: Motivational typography design. A daily reminder to stay focused, work hard, and never stop learning.
